spec_data.Name: nxt_python
spec_data.Description:
nxt_python is a python package for controlling a LEGO NXT robot using the
python programming language.  It can communicate using either USB or Bluetooth.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 01:38:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Nxt_python is a package for controlling a LEGO NXT robot using python
